changeSet.id: wres.TimeSeriesValue - Create TimeSeriesValue table for most dbs.
changeSet.author: Christopher Tubbs, Jesse Bickel

createTable.remarks: Each row represents a value in a single timeseries trace.

column.name: lead
column.remarks: The count of minutes between a single reference datetime type chosen at ingest time and resolved to a reference datetime at ingest time and the valid datetime of this value.

column.name: series_value
column.remarks: Textual description of the original location of the data.
